stanza.line: When I have seen by Time fell hand defaced
The rich proud cost of outworn buriedage
When sometime lofty towers I see down rased
And brass eternal slave to mortalrage
When I have seen the hungry oceangain
Advantage on the kingdom of theshore
And the firm soil win of the waterymain
Increasing store with loss and loss withstore
When I have seen such interchange of State
Or state it self confounded todecay
Ruin hath taught me thus to ruminate
That Time will come and take my loveaway
This thought is as a death which cannotchoose
But weep to have that which it fears tolose
